title: Building My Portfolio Blog
content:
Welcome to my portfolio blog project! This application was built using Node.js, Express, and EJS with a modern, responsive UI.

## Features
- Full CRUD functionality (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
- JSON file storage for data persistence
- Responsive design with CSS Grid/Flexbox
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Modern color palette with CSS variables

## Tech Stack
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express.js
- **Frontend:** EJS templates, Vanilla CSS/JS
- **Storage:** JSON file system
- **Deployment:** Render (free tier)

Feel free to create, edit, or delete posts to test the functionality!

title: The Power of Simple Solutions
content:
This blog demonstrates that you don't need complex infrastructure to build functional web applications. By using a simple JSON file for storage, the app remains lightweight while providing full persistence.

## Why JSON Storage?
1. **Zero cost** - No database hosting fees
2. **Simple setup** - No configuration needed
3. **Portable** - Easy to backup and migrate
4. **Perfect for portfolios** - Shows understanding of file I/O

## Key Learnings
- Async file operations with fs/promises
- Data serialization with JSON
- Error handling for file operations
- UUID generation for unique identifiers

Try creating your own post to see how it works!

title: Modern UI/UX Design Principles
content:
This blog showcases modern web design principles implemented with pure CSS:

## Design Highlights
- **CSS Variables** for consistent theming
- **CSS Grid & Flexbox** for responsive layouts
- **Smooth animations** with CSS transitions
- **Gradient backgrounds** for visual appeal
- **Mobile-first responsive design**

## Color Palette
- Primary: #4361ee (vibrant blue)
- Secondary: #7209b7 (rich purple)
- Accent: #f72585 (energetic pink)
- Neutrals: Clean grayscale for readability

## Typography
- Headings: Space Grotesk (modern, geometric)
- Body: Inter (highly readable, versatile)

The interface provides immediate visual feedback through hover states and smooth transitions.
